briefTitle: NEXT (Nutrition and EXercise During Adjuvant Treatment) Study
officialTitle: Nutrition and Exercise During Adjuvant Treatment (NEXT) Study Implementation of a Physician-referred Exercise and Healthy Eating Intervention as Supportive Care in Breast Cancer Survivors
primaryOutcomeMeasure: The primary outcome will report as recruitment, retention and adherence rates for the sample and their associated 95% confidence intervals
